amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of a unified combatant command for military intelligence.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3710 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3710 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S10392-10394; text: CR S10392-10393) To provide for the establishment of a unified combatant command for military intelligence.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3710 proposed by Senator Chambliss.
